snippet.title: Stellaris: Plantoids Species Pack - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now, read more: http://pdxint.at/2aWXGps

Plantoids is the first species DLC package for Stellaris, Paradox Development Studio’s science fiction grand strategy game. It is the first Species Pack, introducing a new phenotype for players with original art and animations. Plantoids will give you access to a plant-like species that has gained sentience and begun to spread its tendrils across the galaxy, planting the roots of new civilizations on new planets.

Plantoids will include:

- Fifteen new species portraits
- New templates for plantoid civilian and military ships
- New cityscape art.
